flawed_nl_solution:
Marnie has already eaten 5 of the chips + 5 more = <<5+5=10>>10 chips Marnie ate.
The bag has 100 chips in it and Marnie has only eaten 10, 100 - 10 = <<100-10=90>>90 chips left.
If Marnie eats 10 chips a day starting from the second day she has them, it will take her 90 chips in the bag / 10 chips Marine eats a day = <<90/10=9.0>>9.0 days to eat the whole bag.
However, Marnie also ate chips on the first day she bought them, so 9.0 + 1 = <<9.0+1=13.0>>13.0 days to eat the whole bag.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10.0, not 13.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
